meanings.definition: To make a minor adjustment or modification to something.
meanings.sent1: She tweaked the recipe by adding a bit more salt.
meanings.sent2: He tweaked the settings on his phone to make the screen brighter.
meanings.sent3: The chef tweaked the flavors in the soup, making it taste even better.
meanings.sent4: The artist tweaked the colors in the painting until it was just right.
meanings.sent5: After she tweaked the design, it looked much more appealing.

meanings.definition: To pinch, pluck, or twist sharply.
meanings.sent1: He tweaked his brother's ear playfully.
meanings.sent2: She tweaked the fabric to see if it was strong enough.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tweaked the dog's tail and ran away.
meanings.sent4: The gardener tweaked the plant gently to check its health.
meanings.sent5: With a quick tweak, he fixed the loose wire in the lamp.
